entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SHOWERS
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 60
